name: Amaranthine
description: Amaranthine - is a dynamic horizontal scrolling shooter with elements of procedural generation. Travel through warp to the distant frozen planet that sent a distress signal.
minimum_requirements: Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Amaranathine is a great a pick up and play game. It has a great sound track, It's a short game if you know how to play it well. But i do say it's going to take time. The game has great pixel art. But there are some problems like how the ships has content speed or it's really fast. If you like pick up and play games this is the one for you.
Amarananthananmantmantine is clearly an awesome game. Customize your arsenal, buff up your ship, and shoot at the shiny things. Challenging, colorful, funn !   A lot of funn.

I don't normally like side scrolling, shoot em ups, but this one suckered me in for quite a bit. I enjoyed the rougue-like element to improving your ship and the grinding was quite fun. Time will tell if I come back to this one or not, but it's going in my 'keeper' folder... If you like this style game, I think you'd like this game.
